backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two UI enhancements to HomePage.tsx with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose, including pages, components, utilities, and config.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variables for OpenWeatherMap and Google Maps API keys.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining underwater-themed design tokens and global CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling navigation between login, home, and feature pages using state.
frontend/src/components/ContinentalMap.t: Interactive SVG-based continent map with hover, selection, and optional marker rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Underwater-themed global stylesheet defining updated OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/continentDataset.ts: Defines continent-level environmental sample data and provides a helper to find continents by name with direct and partial matching.
frontend/src/lib/countryStateDataset.ts: Contains a dataset of major countries and US states with coordinates and metadata for lookup.
frontend/src/lib/environmentData.ts: Provides utilities to fetch environmental metrics from OpenWeather and USGS, assembling temperature and water quality data into a unified structure.
frontend/src/lib/seaOceanDataset.ts: Defines major sea and ocean locations with coordinates and includes a search helper with normalized and partial matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AuthedLandingPage.tsx: Displays authenticated user info using Internet Identity, showing principal details and account status within styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatePage.tsx: Implements a coral health index calculator using user‑provided environmental metrics and outputs condition, impacts, and suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/CommentPage.tsx: A comment page allowing users to submit ocean-related thoughts, store them locally in state, and delete entries.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleMapPage.tsx: A map search page that locates continents or seas, fetches environmental data, and displays markers and details based on user queries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main landing page with navigation buttons and hero content guiding users to different features.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: A login screen with styled UI that validates email/password locally and triggers navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: A profile settings page allowing users to edit personal data, upload an image, and save it to localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, plugin imports, and extensive color/theme extensions including an underwater palette.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an ICP app with Motoko backend, React/Vite/Tailwind frontend, Internet Identity auth, UI setup, and generated assets.
